name: Occultist of the Grim Dawn (Monk, Bard, PM) - Arelith Request
author: wildleaf

posts.author: wildleaf
posts.content:
I think this is an interesting build idea.. Zen Archery, Xbow user with tons of PM levels. I really want to see what you guys come up with, oh and Arelith restrictions apply.

Thanks!

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content: First quick question - do class restrictions also apply? 'Cos Monk's any Lawful and Bard's any non-Lawful, so we may have an issue there...

posts.author: wildleaf
posts.content: Nope, Arelith allows Lawful Bards

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Is there any particular reason why you want this class combo, and why you want an x- bow xen archer?
Just curious because I don't quite get what you want to achieve with this character.

posts.author: wildleaf
posts.content: Just high AC, PM immunities, Monk speed for running and gunning, and I think the xbow is cool.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
So why Bard and not Wizard, then? At least with higher INT, rather than CHA, you'll be getting more skill points to distribute. And if you wanted to go DEX, Elf would give you a boost with no xp penalty (although xbow might not be the best weapon choice).

I'm not a player of arcanists, let alone builder of them, so I'll leave that for those in the know. But I've had a furtle around in the Build Database and Legacy Archive and found a few Monk/Wiz/PM builds (some DEX, some STR). Alas, they're all level 40 builds, and all take a full Monk schedule pre-epic, followed by 3 levels of Wiz then 16 of PM, with a final Monk dump at level 40. This might not be necessarily true, but it seems to point to there being potential difficulty squeezing all the potential benefits into 30 levels. Just a cautionary note. But, as I say, I'm no arcanist...

Cheers
